changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: create table prices (id numeric, saison_id varchar(10) not null, prix numeric not null, tribune numeric, bloc varchar(5), type_personne varchar(16) not null, TYPE_COMPETITION varchar(16) not null, rang numeric, place numeric, PRICE_TYPE varchar(20))

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table prices add constraint prices_pk primary key (id)

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table prices add constraint prices_season_fk foreign key (saison_id) references saison(SAISON_ID)

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: create sequence PRICES_SEQ as bigint start with 1 increment by 1

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: insert into prices (id, saison_id, prix, bloc, type_personne, type_competition, price_type) select next value for prices_seq, saison, montant, (select bloc_value from bloc where bloc.bloc_id = prix_place.bloc_id), case type_personne_id when 4 then 'ADULT' when 6 then 'LESS_THAN_TWELVE' when 5 then 'TWELVE_EIGHTEEN' when 16 then 'PENSIONED' when 17 then 'STUDENT' end, 'CHAMPIONSHIP', 'ABONNEMENT' from prix_place where type_match_id = 4 and type_personne_id in (4,5,6,16,17)
